Pre-Game Insights: India hold a 14-11 win-loss record over South Africa in the T20I format ahead of their upcoming T20 World Cup 2024 final.
There is nothing much to choose between the two finalists for the T20 World Cup 2024, but India will have a slight upper hand over South Africa owing to the better balance in their lineup.

Cricket Australia announces Test team of the year 2024; Jasprit Bumrah named captain
Miscellaneous Highlights: The pitches at the Kensington Oval in Bridgetown, Barbados, have been very good for batting in the T20 World Cup 2024, but it has also given some assistance at different times for the pacers and spinners alike.
The average first innings score of 153 might not be enough for either South Africa and India to defend in the final of the tournament.
Others: South Africa squad for T20 World Cup 2024: Aiden Markram (c), Ottneil Baartman, Gerald Coetzee, Quinton de Kock, Bjorn Fortuin, Reeza Hendricks, Marco Jansen, Heinrich Klaasen, Keshav Maharaj, David Miller, Anrich Nortje, Kagiso Rabada, Ryan Rickelton, Tabraiz Shamsi, Tristan Stubbs

India squad for T20 World Cup 2024: Rohit Sharma (c), Hardik Pandya, Yashasvi Jaiswal, Virat Kohli, Suryakumar Yadav, Rishabh Pant, Sanju Samson, Shivam Dube, Ravindra Jadeja, Axar Patel, Kuldeep Yadav, Yuzvendra Chahal, Arshdeep Singh, Jasprit Bumrah, Mohammed Siraj
